# Audit Workflow Index (v3)

- Main workflow: `WORKFLOW.md`
- Agent rules: `/AGENTS.md`

## Fast reload
- Snapshot: `snapshots/context-snapshot.md`
- Baseline: `baseline/current.md`

## Guardrails
- Parking lot: `parking-lot.md`
- Change Requests: `cycles/TEMPLATE_change-requests.md`
- Status template: `cycles/TEMPLATE_STATUS.md`

## Templates
- Session template: `sessions/TEMPLATE_SESSION_SXXX.md`
- Cycle templates: `cycles/TEMPLATE_*.md`
